title: Authentic Hungarian Goulash
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter', '2 large onions, diced', '900g diced braising steak', '1/8 teaspoon caraway seed', '1/4 teaspoon dried marjoram', '1 clove garlic, minced', '5 tablespoons paprika', '500ml water', '4 large potatoes, peeled and cubed', 'salt and pepper to taste']
